articles.title: US doctor suffers severe allergic reaction to Moderna coronavirus vaccine: Report - IBTimes India
articles.description: A doctor in Boston, US has suffered a severe allergic reaction after receiving Moderna's coronavirus vaccine on Thursday. This is the first allergic reaction reported from Moderna's vaccine.
